    Class responsible for handling Level's of type Level Two methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelTwo

        public LevelTwo()
        Default Constructor: Set enemies active. Sets game Map as a new Ogre Map. Sets Hero Position to the OgreMap's hero position. Adds a random number of ogres, as enemies, at the OgreMap's enemies position.

      • LevelTwo

        public LevelTwo(char[][] charArr,
                int[][] victory_pos,
                boolean activity,
                boolean hero_armed)
        Level Two Constructor: Constructor from a map, it's victory positions , the enemies activity and if the hero is armed. Calls a superclass constructor.
        Parameters:
        charArr - A matrix of chars containing the map's visual representation.
        victory_pos - A array of positions containing the victory positions of the map.
        activity - Boolean corresponding to whether enemies are active.
        hero_armed - Boolean corresponding to whether hero is active.

      • LevelTwo

        public LevelTwo(int numOgres)
        Level Two Constructor: Sets enemies active. Sets gameMap as a default OgreMap. Sets Hero Position to the DungeonMap's hero position. Adds numOgres number of Ogres, as enemies, at the OgreMap's enemy position.
        Parameters:
        numOgres. - Level Two number of Ogres.
